verses.verse: In the third <WH7969> year <WH8141> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539> a thing <WH1697> was revealed <WH1540> to Daniel, <WH1840> whose name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Belteshazzar; <WH1095> and the thing <WH1697> was true, <WH571> even a great <WH1419> warfare: <WH6635> and he understood <WH995> the thing, <WH1697> and had understanding <WH998> of the vision. <WH4758>
In those days <WH3117> I, <WH1840> Daniel, was mourning <WH56> three <WH7969> whole <WH3117> weeks. <WH7620>

I ate <WH398> no pleasant <WH2532> bread, <WH3899> neither came <WH935> flesh <WH1320> nor wine <WH3196> into my mouth, <WH6310> neither did I anoint <WH5480> myself at all, <WH5480> until three <WH7969> whole <WH3117> weeks <WH7620> were fulfilled. <WH4390>
In the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> as I was by the side <WH3027> of the great <WH1419> river, <WH5104> which is Hiddekel, <WH2313>

I lifted up <WH5375> my eyes, <WH5869> and looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH259> a man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> in linen, <WH906> whose thighs <WH4975> were adorned <WH2296> with pure gold <WH3800> of Uphaz: <WH210>

his body <WH1472> also was like the beryl, <WH8658> and his face <WH6440> as the appearance <WH4758> of lightning, <WH1300> and his eyes <WH5869> as flaming <WH784> torches, <WH3940> and his arms <WH2220> and his feet <WH4772> like <WH5869> burnished <WH7044> brass, <WH5178> and the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697> like the voice <WH6963> of a multitude. <WH1995>

I, <WH1840> Daniel, alone saw <WH7200> the vision; <WH4759> for the men <WH582> who were with me didn't <WH7200> see the vision; <WH4759> but <WH61> a great <WH1419> quaking <WH2731> fell <WH5307> on them, <WH1272> and they fled to hide themselves. <WH2244>

So I was left alone, <WH7604> and saw <WH7200> this great <WH1419> vision, <WH4759> and there remained <WH7604> no strength <WH3581> in me; <WH1935> for my comeliness was turned <WH2015> in me into corruption, <WH4889> and I retained <WH6113> no strength. <WH3581>

Yet heard <WH8085> I the voice <WH6963> of his words; <WH1697> and when I heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of his words, <WH1697> then was I fallen into a deep sleep <WH7290> on my face, <WH6440> with my face <WH6440> toward the ground. <WH776>
Behold, <WH3027> a hand touched <WH5060> me, <WH5128> which set me on my knees <WH1290> and on the palms <WH3709> of my hands. <WH3027>

He said <WH559> to me, <WH1840> Daniel, you man <WH376> greatly beloved, <WH2532> understand <WH995> the words <WH1697> that I speak <WH1696> to you, <WH5975> and stand upright; <WH5977> for am I now sent <WH7971> to you. <WH1696> When he had spoken this word <WH1697> to me, <WH5975> I stood trembling. <WH7460>

Then he said <WH559> to me, <WH3372> Don't be afraid, Daniel; <WH1840> for from the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> that you set <WH5414> your heart <WH3820> to understand, <WH995> and to humble <WH6031> yourself before <WH6440> your God, <WH430> your words <WH1697> were heard: <WH8085> and I have come <WH935> for your words <WH1697>' sake.

But the prince <WH8269> of the kingdom <WH4438> of Persia <WH6539> withstood <WH5975> me twenty <WH6242> - one <WH259> days; <WH3117> but, <WH4317> behold, Michael, one <WH259> of the chief <WH7223> princes, <WH8269> came <WH935> to help <WH5826> me: <WH3498> and I remained there with <WH681> the kings <WH4428> of Persia. <WH6539>
Now I have come <WH935> to make you understand <WH995> what shall happen <WH7136> to your people <WH5971> in the latter <WH319> days; <WH3117> for the vision <WH2377> is yet for many days: <WH3117>
and when he had spoken <WH1696> to me according to these words, <WH1697> I set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> toward the ground, <WH776> and was mute. <WH481>

Behold, <WH1823> one in the likeness of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> touched <WH5060> my lips: <WH8193> then I opened <WH6605> my mouth, <WH6310> and spoke <WH1696> and said <WH559> to him who stood <WH5975> before me, <WH113> my lord, by reason of the vision <WH4759> my sorrows <WH6735> are turned <WH2015> on me, <WH6113> and I retain no strength. <WH3581>

For how <WH1963> can <WH3201> the servant <WH5650> of this my lord <WH113> talk <WH1696> with this my lord? <WH113> for as for me, <WH6258> immediately there remained <WH5975> no strength <WH3581> in me, <WH5397> neither was there breath left in me. <WH7604>
Then there touched <WH5060> me again <WH3254> one like the appearance <WH4758> of a man, <WH120> and he strengthened me. <WH2388>

He said, <WH559> "Greatly beloved <WH2532> man, <WH376> don't <WH3372> be afraid: peace <WH7965> be to you, <WH2388> be strong, yes, <WH2388> be strong." When he spoke <WH1696> to me, <WH2388> I was strengthened, and said, <WH559> "Let my lord <WH113> speak; <WH1696> for you have strengthened me. <WH2388>"

Then he said, <WH559> "Do you know <WH3045> why I have come <WH935> to you? <WH7725> Now I will return to fight <WH3898> with the prince <WH8269> of Persia. <WH6539> When I go forth, <WH3318> behold, <WH8269> the prince of Greece <WH3120> shall come. <WH935>

But <WH61> I will tell <WH5046> you that which is inscribed <WH7559> in the writing <WH3791> of truth: <WH571> and there is none <WH259> who holds <WH2388> with me against these, <WH4317> but Michael your prince. <WH8269>"
